lesson_description: Reinforce learning by connecting classroom instruction to individual problem solving and practice. MATHia serves as the primary instructional tool in these lessons.
learning_goals: I can work independently on my MATHia playlist and engage in activities to support my individual learning goals.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Number Comparison
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description: Students compare two whole numbers by describing their similarities and differences.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Personalized Learning and Intervention
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description:
### MATHia Playlist

#### Getting Started
Students learn how to navigate MATHia, learning about features like hints, the glossary, and the built-in calculator. They explore learning science principles to stay motivated.

#### Exploring the Distributive Property with Numeric Expressions
Students use an interactive grid to model the Distributive Property of Multiplication over Addition with numeric expressions.

### Clarify

#### Center A: Interactive Skills Practice
Students complete the Problem Set 1: Exploring the Distributive Property with Numeric Expressions interactive skills practice to develop their understanding of the Distributive Property to rewrite the product of two numbers as the product of a number and a sum.

### Re-Teach

#### Center B: MATHstream Interactive Video
Students complete a MATHstream video based on the instruction they missed.
• Lesson 1 Taking Apart Numbers and Shapes
º Using the Distributive Property
